title: anontransfer.com
author: anontransfer.com
created_time: August 23, 2023, 03:05:57 PMLast edit: February 26, 2024, 01:53:25 PM by anontransfer.com
content: Upload your files anonymously and free on AnonTransfer. We offer you 15 GB filesize limit and unlimited bandwidth. Upload and transfer files simultaneously to free hosting providers.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PDYzs5H_RRIFeaturesAnonymously(It does not require any registration).Send Large Files.Send Email Transfer.Unlimited bandwidth.Secure File Analysis.Free.ProductsFree Anonymous Chat.Receive Anonymous SMS.Anonymous Disposable Emails.Cryptocurrency Explorer.Internet Speed Test.ToolsIP Lookup.https://anontransfer.com/

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: What’s your business model? I ask that because usually if the product is free, then I’m the product…Some malicious possibilities are: snooping into my files, altering them with a hidden malware, just vanishing whenever, etc

comments.author: anontransfer.com
comments.body: Quote from: TryNinja on August 23, 2023, 03:18:02 PMWhat’s your business model? I ask that because usually if the product is free, then I’m the product…Some malicious possibilities are: snooping into my files, altering them with a hidden malware, just vanishing whenever, etcHello, the files are encrypted and decrypted by the system itself when they are downloaded, the system also works with the VirusTotal analysis to analyze the files, if you upload malicious content the system will throw alerts on the download page.Previously, content with deadly threats was automatically removed, but now a 30-day period has been set for its automatic removal. If you have any other questions you can let us know.

comments.author: Knight Hider
comments.body: I got this error during a 400 MB upload:QuoteService UnavailableThe server is temporarily unable to service your request due to maintenance downtime or capacity problems. Please try again later.--Knight Hider

comments.author: anontransfer.com
comments.body: Quote from: Knight Hider on August 23, 2023, 06:23:31 PMI got this error during a 400 MB upload:QuoteService UnavailableThe server is temporarily unable to service your request due to maintenance downtime or capacity problems. Please try again later.--Knight HiderWe are aware, we are sorry, we were adding some libraries to increase the loading speed and processes. It's fixed, try again. Thank you for using our service.

comments.author: Knight Hider
comments.body: Quote from: anontransfer.com on August 24, 2023, 05:23:46 PMWe are aware, we are sorry, we were adding some libraries to increase the loading speed and processes. It's fixed, try again. Thank you for using our service.Now: "You can't upload files of this type". What file types are allowed?--Knight Hider

All conversations are encrypted, which means that no one can read your messages or see your files.Warning: You can share files in Chat rooms but uploading files with malicious content is prohibited.https://anontransfer.com/chat/

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: @anontransfer.com- I think it would've been better if you allowed your users to choose the expiration dates for those downloadable links [e.g. 24 hours to a month].- You mentioned in one of your recent posts that viewing blocks is also part of your explorer, but I had no luck in finding a way [at most, I can see some transaction details].

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: anontransfer.com on October 17, 2023, 10:39:42 PM..Product Launch..Cryptocurrency ExplorerAs promised, we are very happy to make official the launch of our Cryptocurrency Explorer, where you can check the balance of the addresses, see information about transactions and also blocks. Enjoy it!https://anontransfer.com/explorerI find it pretty unnecessary, since there at plenty other explorers available. Anyhow, if you wanna improve it here is feedback: 1) If BTC is selected in dropdown menu but user searches for ETH address, explorer should show ETH data instead of saying — entry is invalid, like blockcypher. 2) It shows wrong data [1], that's my address I can confirm this is not the true data  [1] https://www.talkimg.com/image/TPdgN

comments.author: anontransfer.com
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on October 22, 2023, 10:00:35 AM@anontransfer.com- I think it would've been better if you allowed your users to choose the expiration dates for those downloadable links [e.g. 24 hours to a month].- You mentioned in one of your recent posts that viewing blocks is also part of your explorer, but I had no luck in finding a way [at most, I can see some transaction details].Hello, we are considering that possibility, we may consider it later. You are right regarding the Block search, right now we are implementing it in the search engine, however it is already available at the system level: https://anontransfer.com/explorer/block/btc/00000000000000000003fb96492ae4cd8e7e70d98ef7d7379a7291347eb6ee91Quote from: libert19 on October 23, 2023, 11:13:07 AMQuote from: anontransfer.com on October 17, 2023, 10:39:42 PM..Product Launch..Cryptocurrency ExplorerAs promised, we are very happy to make official the launch of our Cryptocurrency Explorer, where you can check the balance of the addresses, see information about transactions and also blocks. Enjoy it!https://anontransfer.com/explorerI find it pretty unnecessary, since there at plenty other explorers available. Anyhow, if you wanna improve it here is feedback: 1) If BTC is selected in dropdown menu but user searches for ETH address, explorer should show ETH data instead of saying — entry is invalid, like blockcypher. 2) It shows wrong data [1], that's my address I can confirm this is not the true data  [1] https://www.talkimg.com/image/TPdgNThank you for your comments, we are looking for alternatives that identify us properly, you are right that would be a more precise way, however I think that to address that there is the drop-down menu for the correct selection, but we will consider automating it directly.If you are also right about the incorrect data, there is a problem with Ethereum right now and we are solving it, but only with Ethereum, Bitcoin and Dogecoin it works correctly.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: anontransfer.com on October 22, 2023, 06:23:16 AMTalk freely on AnonTransfer knowing that your messages and meetings are private and secure. All conversations are encrypted, which means that no one can read your messages or see your files.Yeah, I don't know if I can really talk freely with all this ads popping up, telling me that I use adblocker.Even if I disable uBlockerOrigin I am still receiving same message on your website and I also need to fill hCaptcha every time I refresh the page.  This is not what I want to have with any chat, especially not with ''anonymous'' chat.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: 1. So, what are the advantages of your product with Google Drive where we can get free 15 GB?2. Can we set the expiration date over a month? Because I see that only 1 month after I uploaded a file.Quote from: anontransfer.com on September 09, 2023, 02:20:29 PMReceive Anonymous SMS Online FreeUse our free temporary phone numbers for SMS verification and receive SMS online now.https://anontransfer.com/sms/I just disabled the ad blocker, but the website still shows me if I still enabled it, I don't know if a mistake from my side, I haven't researched it. ( I just used a VPN to access your site) so far, your site is smooth when explored, I don't know if your site we can use it for the long term. Because it's quite unique and complete feature for me.
